title: AI-Driven Mass Recruiting Tool
description: Developed a mass recruiting application using TypeScript and ES6, integrated with Node.js and MongoDB. The tool features real-time user environment statistics through AWS, Sentry, and Amplitude, while leveraging CI/CD pipelines for efficient deployment.

title: Comprehensive Trading Platform
description: Created a platform for trading cryptocurrencies, stocks, and options, completing integrations with Plaid for payments and Firebase for mobile notifications. The application emphasizes modular code and robust CI/CD practices.

title: Interconnected Project Suite
description: Led the development of a suite of interconnected projects utilizing a GRPC microservices architecture, employing technologies like ReactJS, NestJS, and MongoDB for high-performance applications.

title: Billiard Club Management System
description: Developed a complete management system for a billiard club using Node.js and NestJS, featuring a GRPC microservices architecture and seamless Stripe payment integration.

title: Robust E-Commerce Application
description: Designed and developed a scalable e-commerce application based on a clientâ€™s Figma design using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and React.js, implementing features like invoicing, order management, and merchant profiles.
